fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Select a player, and choose any role. You will use 3 random abilities from that role on your target. You may use the same ability multiple times.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value: - You can target any number of players at once and each player up to three times.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Use your ability at least one hundred twenty-three times.
